author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Implement property setting/removal for directories and files.
(commit_context_t): Take our log message as a svn_string_t.
(proppatch_walker): Treat val as a const; properly XML-ify or base64-ify the
property before transmitting; correctly handle multiple properties.
(open_root): Set up changed and removed_props; set log in changed props.
(open_directory): Create changed and removed properties in case we have
(close_directory, close_file): Send PROPPATCH if we have any changes.
(svn_ra_serf__get_commit_editor): Convert log message to a string.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Make the property hashes opaque to the stored content.
(set_baton_props, set_file_props, set_dir_props): Treate val as a const.

author: rooneg
msg: Fix history traversal in the face of moves.
(examine_copy_inheritance): Grab the copy based on our cached move_id in
(txn_body_history_prev): Handle the copy_kind_move case specially when
calculating dest paths, source revs and dest revs, since the fact that
the dest node is identical to the source node throws those calculations

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * www/hacking.html: Clarify our wording about decorating functions whether
they be public, library-private, or file-private.
